refnamediv.refpurpose: Create a new palette based image

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: imagecreate returns an image identifier representing a blank image of size x_size by y_size.
We recommend the use of imagecreatetruecolor.

example.title: Creating a new GD image stream and outputting an image.
example.programlisting:
<?php
header ("Content-type: image/png");
$im = @imagecreate (50, 100)
    or die ("Cannot Initialize new GD image stream");
$background_color = imagecolorallocate ($im, 255, 255, 255);
$text_color = imagecolorallocate ($im, 233, 14, 91);
imagestring ($im, 1, 5, 5,  "A Simple Text String", $text_color);
imagepng ($im);
imagedestroy ($im);
?>
